argument.description: The string to convert to uppercase.

description: The PostgreSQL upper function converts all characters in the specified string to uppercase.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT upper('Tech on the Net');
      upper
-----------------
 TECH ON THE NET
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT upper('TechOnTheNet.com is #1');
         upper
------------------------
 TECHONTHENET.COM IS #1
(1 row)
